mapper.select: /* selectSupportContactList */ SELECT A.CONTACT_CAT , A.CONTACT_NM , A.CONTACT_TEL , A.CONTACT_MAIL , (SELECT FILE_USER_NM FROM TB_FILE F WHERE F.FILE_DATA_SN = A.CONTACT_SN AND F.USE_STATE = 'Y' AND F.FILE_CONTENT_CD = 'main') AS FILE_USER_NM_MAIN , (SELECT FILE_PATH FROM TB_FILE F WHERE F.FILE_DATA_SN = A.CONTACT_SN AND F.USE_STATE = 'Y' AND F.FILE_CONTENT_CD = 'main') AS FILE_PATH_MAIN FROM TB_SUPPORT_CONTACT A WHERE A.USE_STATE = 'Y' AND A.CONTACT_ID = #{contact_id} ORDER BY A.DISPLAY_YN DESC, A.SORT_NO ASC
